personal.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love creating efficient, scalable solutions and bringing ideas to life through code.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with Next.js, featuring user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and weather alerts.

experience.description: Lead development of web applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Mentored junior developers and implemented best practices.
Developed responsive web applications and collaborated with design teams to create engaging user experiences.
